text: “Kenako tinasintha pamalo pa choipa pobweretsapo chabwino, (tidawachotsera masautso ndi mavuto ngakhale sadali okhulupirira) mpaka anachuluka, ndi kuchulukanso chuma chawo; anayamba kunena kuti: “Masautso ndi mavuto adawakhudzaponso makolo athu. (Zoterezi sizachilendo kwa ife).” Choncho tidawaononga mwadzidzidzi asakudziwa
